description:
<p>We have an opportunity to work in our Vulnerable Young Peoples Team, based within social care. You will need to provide mental health assessment, therapeutic intervention and care navigation to young people (17-25) who are care experienced from the Kirklees area. Working across social care and NHS to offer advice and support to professionals working with this varied and complex client group. This is an innovative role requiring a creative and pragmatic practitioner.</p>
<p>Please note the working pattern for this post is 37.5 hours per week</p>

hiringOrganization.name: South West Yorkshire Partnership NHS Foundation Trust

title: Senior Mental Health Practitioner
